name: Jonesville
description:
Live, learn, and compete in this classic educational life simulator!
Be the first to achieve all four main goals: wealth, happiness, work experience, and education.



Play solo against computer, team up with friends in multiplayer (up to 4 players), or take turns in hot seat mode (up to 4 players+computer).
Balance your needs by eating, finding a job, spending free time, pursuing education to unlock better careers, and shopping for various consumer goods. Watch out for random events like market crash, fire, road blockade and more.

Explore a vibrant map filled with essential locations: job office, bank, mall, university, market, pawn shop and more!


Collect 50 unique hats to personalize your avatar and unlock achievements.


Over 200 items to buy, including your home furnishing


Over 150 weekend cards to choose from and more!
